Adds play counts to Play-by-Play data Adds play counts to Play-by-Play data pulled from the API's raw game data

add_play_counts.Rd

Adds play counts to Play-by-Play data Adds play counts to Play-by-Play data pulled from the API's raw game data

add_play_counts(play_df)

Arguments

play_df

(data.frame required): Adds play counts to Play-by-Play dataframe, as pulled from cfbd_pbp_data()

Value

The original play_df with the following columns appended/redefined:

game_play_number

.

half_clock.minutes

.

TimeSecsRem

.

Under_two

.

half

.

.
